name: plaso_ts
description:
Processes a list of file paths using plaso and sends results to Timesketch.

- Collectors collect from a path in the FS
- Processes them with a local install of plaso
- Exports them to a new Timesketch sketch
short_description: Processes a list of file paths using plaso and sends results to Timesketch.
args: Whether to verify the certificate provided by the Timesketch endpoint.
Sketch to which the timeline should be added
